Dear Sheffield City Council,
1)Please can you provide a copy of the initial contact letter sent to new home educators in your Local Authority?
2)(a)Is the initial contact letter the same whether the parent has deregistered from a school or been home-educating from the start and you become aware of the family some other way?
(b)If they are different please provide a copy of both letters.
3)When was your EHE policy last updated?
4) Were local home educators involved directly in the process of reviewing the EHE policy when it was last updated.
Yours faithfully,
Michelle Zaher
Educational Freedom

Dear Michelle Zaher,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Elective Home
Education which we received on 31/08/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 27/09/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ

Dear Michelle Zaher,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Elective Home
Education which we received on 31/08/2024.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
1)Please can you provide a copy of the initial contact letter sent to new
home educators in your Local Authority?
• EHE 2 – Curriculum request attached
2)(a)Is the initial contact letter the same whether the parent has
deregistered from a school or been home educating from the start and you
become aware of the family some other way?
• No template, specific letter created as and when required
(b)If they are different, please provide a copy of both letters.
• NA
3)When was your EHE policy last updated?
• 2024
4) Were local home educators involved directly in the process of reviewing
the EHE policy when it was last updated.
• No
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [1]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
